issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] TPC-H Query 4
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Intervals expressions not yet supported.

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9434

Error:

Running benchmarks with the following options: BenchmarkOpt { query: 4, debug: false, iterations: 10, concurrency: 2, batch_size: 32768, path: "/home/danielheres/Code/gdd/arrow/rust/benchmarks/tpch-dbgen", file_format: "tbl", mem_table: false, partitions: 8 }
Error: NotImplemented("Unsupported Interval Expression with leading_field Some(Month)")

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11521?focusedCommentId=17332358) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/160
